amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendment Nos. 20 and 29 contained in House Report 110-261 and printed on page H8763 in the Congressional Record for July 27, 2007.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of the following amendments offered En Bloc in Part B of House Report 110-261: Amendment Nos. 20 and 29.

action.text: Peterson (MN) amendment (A015) modified by unanimous consent. Modification consist of text offered to Part B amendment numbered 20.
On agreeing to the Peterson (MN) amendments (A015) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
